homePage.subtitle: Know your rights, stay safe, and access help when you need it.
homePage.workContractIntro: Learn more about your work contract...
homePage.watchVideo: Watch this short video in Nepali

healthcareInsurance.mandatoryInsuranceDesc: In Qatar, your employer is legally required to provide you with health insurance. This insurance should cover basic medical services, ensuring you have access to healthcare when you need it.
healthcareInsurance.coverageDesc: Typically, your health insurance will cover doctor visits, hospital stays, and emergency treatment. It may also cover some medications. However, it might not cover everything, so it's important to understand the details of your policy.
healthcareInsurance.findDoctorDesc: Ask your employer or insurance provider for a list of doctors and clinics covered by your insurance.
healthcareInsurance.emergencyDesc: Go to the nearest hospital emergency room.
healthcareInsurance.carryCardDesc: Always carry your health insurance card and your Qatar ID.
healthcareInsurance.publicPrivateDesc: Qatar has both public (government-run) and private healthcare facilities. Public facilities may require a health card.
healthcareInsurance.mentalHealthDesc: Include information about mental health support services here
healthcareInsurance.contactsDesc: List contact information for relevant healthcare authorities
